properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Okaloosa-Walton County Line to Pensacola FL out 20 NM; Mississippi Sound; South Mobile Bay; Coastal waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS out 20 NM
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 4 at 2:48PM CST until February 5 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to 1/4 NM or less. For the Small Craft Advisory,
west winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 6 to 9
ft expected.

* WHERE...Southern Mobile Bay, Mississippi Sound, Coastal waters
from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS out 20 NM and Coastal
waters from Okaloosa Walton County Line FL to Pensacola FL out
20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to
noon CST Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 PM
Wednesday to 9 AM CST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Low
visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO 9 AM CST FRIDAY
